explains: n. 拥有数百万家财的富豪，千万富翁，大富豪

sentences.en: The average age of a multimillionaire is 39.
sentences.cn: 千万富豪平均年龄为39岁。

sentences.en: In the end the billionaire trounced the mere multimillionaire.
sentences.cn: 最后亿万富翁打败了千万富翁。

sentences.en: Kelly was a multimillionaire contractor who was a triple Olympic Gold Medal winner.
sentences.cn: 克利是一个拥有三个奥运金牌的千万富翁。
